text:
Randomly walked in to JC with no expectation but I ended up walk away with a pair of my bridal pumpüòç

I was served by Bryan, he gave practical advise on choosing the ‚Äúevergreen‚Äù pump that I can even wear post wedding.

JC‚Äôs pump cutting def is magical, it looks so good üòçüòçüòç

As a Swarovski lover, I‚Äôm hooked by the crystal details on my pump.

Best choice! Thanks Bryan :D
Merina was very helpful and patient. She gave honest advice on choosing my very first pair of JC. Thank you, Merina. :)
The staff very unfriendly, mad at someone or something. Even we greeted her twice, she just showed her grumpy face to us. Never coming back.
Excellent service and patience renderer by the SA, hence walked out with a pair of shoes from them.

I had a terrible experience at Jimmy Choo. The staff was extremely rude and unhelpful. They seemed reluctant to assist me, and when I asked for help, they gave me short, dismissive answers. It was clear that they didn't want to be bothered with me.

I immediately contacted MBS to complain about the terrible service I had received from the Jimmy Choo staff. However, I never received a reply from Jimmy Choo, which shows that they don't care about their customers or their satisfaction.

Overall, I would strongly advise against shopping at this outlet. The staff is rude and unhelpful, and the company doesn't seem to care about their customers. Save yourself the trouble and shop somewhere else
